nodes.bodyText: @bdaw I always have a problem with this one: "Klienci" or "Klienty" ? Usually, I use "Aplikacje klienckie", so I don't hit this problem.

nodes.bodyText: In the account console this gets rendered as "Wróć do Konsola administratora bezpieczeństwa". Perhaps we should put ":" at the end?
